name: Nextbot chasing
description: Have you ever been face Obunga, if not so let's escape the obunga chase in Nextbot chasing game.Obunga is very angry and tries to catch up with you, What will you do in Nextbot chasing game? Will you be able to make escape. Let's see if you can escape scary Obunga chase in Nextbot chasing gameRun and jump to escape from them and collect all coins for win!Download now and enjoy the best obby game.
